pr_title: Disable TRACE and OPTIONS on REST services

timeline.message: Disable TRACE and OPTIONS on REST services

timeline.bodyText: Place private static final in its own group before private final
timeline.author: calvinjia

timeline.bodyText: I don't think we want the session handler to be created.
timeline.author: calvinjia

timeline.message: Make context handler options more explicit

timeline.bodyText: we want NO_SESSIONS instead of NO_SECURITY
timeline.author: calvinjia
